name: Professor Brainium's Games
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Professor Brainium is on a mission...

to expand minds with his favorite brain-building games. These addictive puzzles have challenged the logic of young and old for generations. With both single-player and wireless multiplayer modes. Professor Brainium has a challenge for everyone from age 5 to 105.

Can you master Professor Brainium's Games?
  • SUDOKU
  • CROSS SUMS
  • MAHJONGG
  • MIND BENDER
  • GO
